conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm calling from DeepData AI. I understand you're the CTO at Bearer, and I'd like to introduce our data processing solution that can help you scale your code security operations.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yes. We're always looking for ways to improve our security posture. But I have to say, we've already invested heavily in our current infrastructure. What makes DeepData AI so special that it's worth considering a change?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, our solution uses AI-powered algorithms to process large datasets quickly and efficiently, which can help you identify vulnerabilities faster and more accurately. Plus, it integrates seamlessly with your existing CI/CD pipeline.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds interesting, but we're in the middle of a major product launch right now. I'm not sure if this is the right time to be implementing new technology. Can you tell me more about the implementation process and how it would affect our current workflow?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. Our implementation process is designed to be as smooth as possible, with minimal disruption to your existing operations. We can have you up and running in a matter of weeks, and our support team is available 24/7 to ensure a seamless transition.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see. And what kind of pricing are we looking at? We're a growing company, but we still have to be mindful of our budget.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing varies depending on the size of your organization and the scope of the implementation. But for a company of your size, we're looking at around $50,000 per year.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That's a bit steeper than I was expecting. We've also been looking at some of your competitors, like Datadog and Splunk, and their pricing seems more in line with what we're willing to pay.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that price is a concern, but I believe our solution offers more advanced features and better support than our competitors. I'd be happy to discuss a customized pricing plan that fits your needs.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but after careful consideration, I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI. The price is just too high for us, and we can't justify the cost at this time. Thank you for reaching out, but I think we'll have to explore other options.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Price
Feedback: The seller should have been more prepared to address the buyer's price concerns and offer a more customized or flexible pricing plan earlier in the conversation to potentially overcome the objection. Sentiment: Neutral
